name: Realistic Illusion
description: Realistic Illusion is the first person player adventure game with stylized graphics. The game has a characteristic climate, little mysterious, little psychedelic, interweaving with fantasy themes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 9 Storage: 500 MB available space
